EmailTemplate.subject: What to do about the big news from RIS News
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As you might have seen from RIS News recently, 58% of c-stores plan to add a mobile app in the near future. And operators say that adding self-checkout is a top 10 opportunity for next year, but that their legacy IT presents obstacles. It’s clear where the industry is heading. Fortunately, NCR makes it easy to add new solutions and services to your existing system that enables mobile payments, robust self-checkout and expanded food service.
